meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of ascospores.
meanings.sent1: The ascosporic fungi release tiny spores.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the ascosporic characteristics of the mold.
meanings.sent3: The ascosporic mushrooms seemed to dance in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a canvas painted with colorful ascosporic dots.
meanings.sent5: The ascosporic nature of the plant made it easy to identify.

meanings.sent1: The ascosporic sacs burst open, releasing spores.
meanings.sent2: The ascosporic structure of the lichen was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The ascosporic bread dough rose higher than expected.
meanings.sent4: The ascosporic cloud of pollen filled the air with life.
meanings.sent5: The ascosporic fruiting bodies were a sign of a healthy ecosystem.
